item.title: ROCKET-1: Master Open-World Interaction with Visual-Temporal Context Prompting
item.description: ROCKET-1 masters open-world Minecraft interaction by using visual-temporal context prompting, enabling VLMs to effectively guide low-level policies for complex tasks.
